title: For Years, Poland Warned of the Russian Threat. Now, the West Is Listening.
sub_head: President Biden will visit Warsaw on Friday, a country thrust to the forefront of Western efforts to repel Russian aggression
body:
WARSAW—When President Biden lands in Poland on Friday, he will arrive in a country that has become a central player in Europe’s conflict with Russia.
More than two million Ukrainians have fled to Poland since the Russian invasion began a month ago. Arms shipments from the West are largely sent into Ukraine through Poland. Injured Ukrainian soldiers are evacuated to Polish hospitals.
